titles.title: A bill for the relief of Danny Thomas.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 6/28/1988--Introduced. Authorizes a named individual to commence an action for claims against the Government relating to injuries sustained as a result of the explosion of an oil drum at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina.
